snippet.title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Attack at Dawn: North Africa is a strategy game set in WW2 North African theatre. It features 3 campaigns, and 15 scenarios that can be played in solo or multiplayer modes. It can be played as a real-time, or turn-based (WeGo) game. The game begins with the German troops probing into the Libyan region of Cyrenaica and finishes either with the total defeat of German-Italian Panzer Armee or with the British loss of Egypt and their retreat across the Suez Canal.

🕹️ Buy on STEAM: https://bit.ly/3tgYdt3

For more information, visit: https://www.panzerdivisiongames.com/
